17namespace {
18
19const char kGlobalDebuggerScriptHandleLabel[] = "DevTools debugger";
20
21String16 calculateHash(v8::Isolate* isolate, v8::Local<v8::String> source) {
22 std::unique_ptr<UChar[]> buffer(new UChar[source->Length()]);
23 int written = source->Write(
24 isolate, reinterpret_cast<uint16_t*>(buffer.get()), 0, source->Length());
25
26 const uint8_t* data = nullptr;
27 size_t sizeInBytes = sizeof(UChar) * written;
28 data = reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>(buffer.get());
29
30 uint8_t hash[kSizeOfSha256Digest];
31 v8::internal::SHA256_hash(data, sizeInBytes, hash);
32
33 String16Builder formatted_hash;
34 for (size_t i = 0; i < kSizeOfSha256Digest; i++)
35 formatted_hash.appendUnsignedAsHex(static_cast<uint8_t>(hash[i]));
36
37 return formatted_hash.toString();
38}
39
40class ActualScript : public V8DebuggerScript {
41 friend class V8DebuggerScript;
42
43 public:
44 ActualScript(v8::Isolate* isolate, v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> script,
45 bool isLiveEdit, V8DebuggerAgentImpl* agent,
46 V8InspectorClient* client)
47 : V8DebuggerScript(isolate, String16::fromInteger(script->Id()),
48 GetScriptURL(isolate, script, client),
49 GetScriptName(isolate, script, client)),
50 m_agent(agent),
51 m_isLiveEdit(isLiveEdit) {
52 Initialize(script);
53 }
54
55 bool isLiveEdit() const override { return m_isLiveEdit; }
56 bool isModule() const override { return m_isModule; }
57
58 String16 source(size_t pos, size_t len) const override {
59 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
60 v8::Local<v8::String> v8Source;
61 if (!m_scriptSource.Get(m_isolate)->JavaScriptCode().ToLocal(&v8Source)) {
62 return String16();
63 }
64 if (pos >= static_cast<size_t>(v8Source->Length())) return String16();
65 size_t substringLength =
66 std::min(len, static_cast<size_t>(v8Source->Length()) - pos);
67 std::unique_ptr<UChar[]> buffer(new UChar[substringLength]);
68 v8Source->Write(m_isolate, reinterpret_cast<uint16_t*>(buffer.get()),
69 static_cast<int>(pos), static_cast<int>(substringLength));
70 return String16(buffer.get(), substringLength);
71 }
72 Language getLanguage() const override { return m_language; }
73
74#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
75 v8::Maybe<v8::MemorySpan<const uint8_t>> wasmBytecode() const override {
76 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
77 v8::MemorySpan<const uint8_t> bytecode;
78 if (m_scriptSource.Get(m_isolate)->WasmBytecode().To(&bytecode)) {
79 return v8::Just(bytecode);
80 }
81 return v8::Nothing<v8::MemorySpan<const uint8_t>>();
82 }
83
84 v8::Maybe<v8::debug::WasmScript::DebugSymbolsType> getDebugSymbolsType()
85 const override {
86 auto script = this->script();
87 if (!script->IsWasm())
88 return v8::Nothing<v8::debug::WasmScript::DebugSymbolsType>();
89 return v8::Just(v8::debug::WasmScript::Cast(*script)->GetDebugSymbolType());
90 }
91
92 v8::Maybe<String16> getExternalDebugSymbolsURL() const override {
93 auto script = this->script();
94 if (!script->IsWasm()) return v8::Nothing<String16>();
95 v8::MemorySpan<const char> external_url =
96 v8::debug::WasmScript::Cast(*script)->ExternalSymbolsURL();
97 if (external_url.size() == 0) return v8::Nothing<String16>();
98 return v8::Just(String16(external_url.data(), external_url.size()));
99 }
100
101 void Disassemble(v8::debug::DisassemblyCollector* collector,
102 std::vector<int>* function_body_offsets) const override {
103 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
104 v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> script = this->script();
105 DCHECK(script->IsWasm());
106 v8::debug::WasmScript::Cast(*script)->Disassemble(collector,
107 function_body_offsets);
108 }
109#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
110
111 int startLine() const override { return m_startLine; }
112 int startColumn() const override { return m_startColumn; }
113 int endLine() const override { return m_endLine; }
114 int endColumn() const override { return m_endColumn; }
115 int codeOffset() const override {
116#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
117 if (script()->IsWasm()) {
118 return v8::debug::WasmScript::Cast(*script())->CodeOffset();
119 }
120#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
121 return 0;
122 }
123 int length() const override {
124 return static_cast<int>(m_scriptSource.Get(m_isolate)->Length());
125 }
126
127 const String16& sourceMappingURL() const override {
128 return m_sourceMappingURL;
129 }
130
131 void setSourceMappingURL(const String16& sourceMappingURL) override {
132 m_sourceMappingURL = sourceMappingURL;
133 }
134
135 void setSource(const String16& newSource, bool preview,
136 bool allowTopFrameLiveEditing,
137 v8::debug::LiveEditResult* result) override {
138 v8::EscapableHandleScope scope(m_isolate);
139 v8::Local<v8::String> v8Source = toV8String(m_isolate, newSource);
140 if (!m_script.Get(m_isolate)->SetScriptSource(
141 v8Source, preview, allowTopFrameLiveEditing, result)) {
142 result->message = scope.Escape(result->message);
143 return;
144 }
145 // NOP if preview or unchanged source (diffs.empty() in PatchScript)
146 if (preview || result->script.IsEmpty()) return;
147
148 m_hash = String16();
149 Initialize(scope.Escape(result->script));
150 }
151
152 bool getPossibleBreakpoints(
153 const v8::debug::Location& start, const v8::debug::Location& end,
154 bool restrictToFunction,
155 std::vector<v8::debug::BreakLocation>* locations) override {
156 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
157 v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> script = m_script.Get(m_isolate);
158 std::vector<v8::debug::BreakLocation> allLocations;
159 if (!script->GetPossibleBreakpoints(start, end, restrictToFunction,
160 &allLocations)) {
161 return false;
162 }
163 if (allLocations.empty()) return true;
164 v8::debug::BreakLocation current = allLocations[0];
165 for (size_t i = 1; i < allLocations.size(); ++i) {
166 if (allLocations[i].GetLineNumber() == current.GetLineNumber() &&
167 allLocations[i].GetColumnNumber() == current.GetColumnNumber()) {
168 if (allLocations[i].type() != v8::debug::kCommonBreakLocation) {
169 DCHECK(allLocations[i].type() == v8::debug::kCallBreakLocation ||
170 allLocations[i].type() == v8::debug::kReturnBreakLocation);
171 // debugger can returns more then one break location at the same
172 // source location, e.g. foo() - in this case there are two break
173 // locations before foo: for statement and for function call, we can
174 // merge them for inspector and report only one with call type.
175 current = allLocations[i];
176 }
177 } else {
178 // we assume that returned break locations are sorted.
179 DCHECK(
180 allLocations[i].GetLineNumber() > current.GetLineNumber() ||
181 (allLocations[i].GetColumnNumber() >= current.GetColumnNumber() &&
182 allLocations[i].GetLineNumber() == current.GetLineNumber()));
183 locations->push_back(current);
184 current = allLocations[i];
185 }
186 }
187 locations->push_back(current);
188 return true;
189 }
190
191 void resetBlackboxedStateCache() override {
192 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
193 v8::debug::ResetBlackboxedStateCache(m_isolate, m_script.Get(m_isolate));
194 }
195
196 v8::Maybe<int> offset(int lineNumber, int columnNumber) const override {
197 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
198 return m_script.Get(m_isolate)->GetSourceOffset(
199 v8::debug::Location(lineNumber, columnNumber));
200 }
201
202 v8::debug::Location location(int offset) const override {
203 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
204 return m_script.Get(m_isolate)->GetSourceLocation(offset);
205 }
206
207 bool setBreakpoint(const String16& condition, v8::debug::Location* location,
208 int* id) const override {
209 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
210 return script()->SetBreakpoint(toV8String(m_isolate, condition), location,
211 id);
212 }
213
214 bool setInstrumentationBreakpoint(int* id) const override {
215 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
216 return script()->SetInstrumentationBreakpoint(id);
217 }
218
219 const String16& hash() const override {
220 if (!m_hash.isEmpty()) return m_hash;
221 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
222 v8::Local<v8::String> v8Source;
223 if (!m_scriptSource.Get(m_isolate)->JavaScriptCode().ToLocal(&v8Source)) {
224 v8Source = v8::String::Empty(m_isolate);
225 }
226 m_hash = calculateHash(m_isolate, v8Source);
227 DCHECK(!m_hash.isEmpty());
228 return m_hash;
229 }
230
231 private:
232 static String16 GetScriptURL(v8::Isolate* isolate,
233 v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> script,
234 V8InspectorClient* client) {
235 v8::Local<v8::String> sourceURL;
236 if (script->SourceURL().ToLocal(&sourceURL) && sourceURL->Length() > 0)
237 return toProtocolString(isolate, sourceURL);
238 return GetScriptName(isolate, script, client);
239 }
240
241 static String16 GetScriptName(v8::Isolate* isolate,
242 v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> script,
243 V8InspectorClient* client) {
244 v8::Local<v8::String> v8Name;
245 if (script->Name().ToLocal(&v8Name) && v8Name->Length() > 0) {
246 String16 name = toProtocolString(isolate, v8Name);
247 std::unique_ptr<StringBuffer> url =
248 client->resourceNameToUrl(toStringView(name));
249 return url ? toString16(url->string()) : name;
250 }
251 return String16();
252 }
253
254 v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> script() const override {
255 return m_script.Get(m_isolate);
256 }
257
258 void Initialize(v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> script) {
259 v8::Local<v8::String> tmp;
260 m_hasSourceURLComment =
261 script->SourceURL().ToLocal(&tmp) && tmp->Length() > 0;
262 if (script->SourceMappingURL().ToLocal(&tmp))
263 m_sourceMappingURL = toProtocolString(m_isolate, tmp);
264 m_startLine = script->StartLine();
265 m_startColumn = script->StartColumn();
266 m_endLine = script->EndLine();
267 m_endColumn = script->EndColumn();
268
269 USE(script->ContextId().To(&m_executionContextId));
270 m_language = V8DebuggerScript::Language::JavaScript;
271#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
272 if (script->IsWasm()) {
273 m_language = V8DebuggerScript::Language::WebAssembly;
274 }
275#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
276
277 m_isModule = script->IsModule();
278
279 bool hasHash = script->GetSha256Hash().ToLocal(&tmp) && tmp->Length() > 0;
280 if (hasHash) {
281 m_hash = toProtocolString(m_isolate, tmp);
282 }
283
284 m_script.Reset(m_isolate, script);
285 m_script.AnnotateStrongRetainer(kGlobalDebuggerScriptHandleLabel);
286 m_scriptSource.Reset(m_isolate, script->Source());
287 m_scriptSource.AnnotateStrongRetainer(kGlobalDebuggerScriptHandleLabel);
288 }
289
290 void MakeWeak() override {
291 m_script.SetWeak(
292 this,
293 [](const v8::WeakCallbackInfo<ActualScript>& data) {
294 data.GetParameter()->WeakCallback();
295 },
296 v8::WeakCallbackType::kParameter);
297 }
298
299 void WeakCallback() {
300 m_script.Reset();
301 m_agent->ScriptCollected(this);
302 }
303
304 V8DebuggerAgentImpl* m_agent;
305 String16 m_sourceMappingURL;
306 Language m_language;
307 bool m_isLiveEdit = false;
308 bool m_isModule = false;
309 mutable String16 m_hash;
310 int m_startLine = 0;
311 int m_startColumn = 0;
312 int m_endLine = 0;
313 int m_endColumn = 0;
314 v8::Global<v8::debug::Script> m_script;
315 v8::Global<v8::debug::ScriptSource> m_scriptSource;
316};
317
318} // namespace
319
320std::unique_ptr<V8DebuggerScript> V8DebuggerScript::Create(
321 v8::Isolate* isolate, v8::Local<v8::debug::Script> scriptObj,
322 bool isLiveEdit, V8DebuggerAgentImpl* agent, V8InspectorClient* client) {
323 return std::make_unique<ActualScript>(isolate, scriptObj, isLiveEdit, agent,
324 client);
325}
326
327V8DebuggerScript::V8DebuggerScript(v8::Isolate* isolate, String16 id,
328 String16 url, String16 embedderName)
329 : m_id(std::move(id)),
330 m_url(std::move(url)),
331 m_isolate(isolate),
332 m_embedderName(embedderName) {}
333
334V8DebuggerScript::~V8DebuggerScript() = default;
335
336void V8DebuggerScript::setSourceURL(const String16& sourceURL) {
337 if (sourceURL.length() > 0) {
338 m_hasSourceURLComment = true;
339 m_url = sourceURL;
340 }
341}
342
343#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
344void V8DebuggerScript::removeWasmBreakpoint(int id) {
345 v8::HandleScope scope(m_isolate);
346 script()->RemoveWasmBreakpoint(id);
347}
348#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
